name: 16-GATK
description: Toolkit for variant discovery and genotyping

parameters.name: Analysis type
parameters.description: Name of the tool to run

parameters.name: Input file
parameters.description: Input file containing sequence data (BAM or CRAM)

parameters.name: Show full bam list
parameters.description: Emit list of input BAM/CRAM files to log

parameters.name: Jdk deflater
parameters.description: Use the JDK Deflater instead of the IntelDeflater for writing BAMs

parameters.name: Jdk inflater
parameters.description: Use the JDK Inflater instead of the IntelInflater for reading BAMs
